thread.section_title: Gym Direct Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Gym Direct | www.gymdirect.com.au
thread.title: Michael George
thread.title_full: Gym Direct reviewed by Michael George

author: Michael George
title: Michael George
text: I actually ordered the wrong gear. Gym Direct were extremely helpful and helped organise to pick up the order and then helped me with ordering the right stuff. Customer service is A1 and I couldn't be happier with the equipment. These guys really do care that you are getting the right gear. Will order from them again and highly recommend.
